channel.title: DeltaSource Null Problem(will pay)
channel.description:
Hi, i still have not found any method for fixing the Null Bug that occurs randomly at times. Examplein my server CMD/run.bat:
[code]NULL NULL NULL random text NULL NULL random text[/code] Once this occur, message replay on the server and eveyrone black screens logging in till the autoreset I have had deltascape source for a long time and we just started happening aloot over the last month. Before it only happened when i left server on at times. I have had this source for 8-9 months and i do not want to ditch it for all the hard work i put into it.
If anyone knows any tuts that may help, any areas i may look so i can fix this problem, please because it is annoying my players when it freezes and nulls them disbaling them from playing my server.
Thank you...I will pay 10 dollars USD if you know a direct fix to this problem.
I.e...this isnt the anti-leech.
msn is websterscape@yahoo.com and yes that is my msn

item.title: DeltaSource Null Problem(will pay)
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

No, it is online and it happens at random times, it’s not a nuller/antisyipkpker, i think it has something to do with playerloading but i do not know exaclty what is going on…i shud ahve avoided deltascape 8 months ago, its very buggy and stuff…

Read full topic

item.title: DeltaSource Null Problem(will pay)
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

There really needs to be a slap head emoticon… I was asking does it do it when the server is offline, because if it only does it online, it could just be a nuller/syipker/d*ckhead. If it does it when its not online it could mean something is contradicting itself in a file, perhaps when someone does something specific like say, thieving from a stall. Get back to me.

Read full topic

Hi, i still have not found any method for fixing the Null Bug that occurs randomly at times. Examplein my server CMD/run.bat:

NULL NULL NULL random text NULL NULL random text
Once this occur, message replay on the server and eveyrone black screens logging in till the autoreset
I have had deltascape source for a long time and we just started happening aloot over the last month. Before it only happened when i left server on at times. I have had this source for 8-9 months and i do not want to ditch it for all the hard work i put into it.

If anyone knows any tuts that may help, any areas i may look so i can fix this problem, please because it is annoying my players when it freezes and nulls them disbaling them from playing my server.
